# ==========================================
# GIS & QGIS PROJECT .gitignore TEMPLATE
# ==========================================

# RAW DATA (large files, not for GitHub)
data_raw/
data_processed/*.tif
data_processed/*.vrt
data_processed/*.img
data_processed/*.asc

# OUTPUTS (regenerated by scripts)
outputs/*.tif
outputs/*.shp
outputs/*.dbf
outputs/*.shx
outputs/*.geojson
outputs/*.json
outputs/*.pdf
outputs/*.png

# QGIS SYSTEM FILES
*.qgz~
.qgis2/
.qgis3/
**/.qgis_cache/
**/*.aux.xml
**/*.qml
**/*.qmd

# PYTHON
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# LOGS
logs/
*.log

# TEMP FILES
tmp/
temp/
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# WINDOWS TRASH
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store
